schedule.description: Initial generation with 540p model for faster rough draft
Refinement with 720p model for higher quality details

notes.usage: This configuration demonstrates using a lower resolution model for initial generation followed by a higher resolution model for refinement
notes.memory_optimization: This approach can help manage memory usage on Apple Silicon by using the heavier model only for refinement
notes.customization: Users can adjust start_step and end_step values to find the optimal balance between speed and quality
